channel.title: Max Players? - John
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i243.photobucket.com/albums/ff41/NeostenAdmin/Ummmm.jpg[/img]
So uhhh can anyone make a random guess of the maximum players I could hold on a server with a little stability but still laggy normally at 40players? I was wondering because my other comuter has 960MB of RAM this is my computer I rarely use. I heard Dedis are like 1GB of Ram - 4Gb of ram sometimes. I'v never hosted on this computer. Every thing I do on this computer is like light speed so I was thinking about hosting on it. I'v only had it up when my older but more up to date computer was broken. (Like right now....)
If my computer here could hold a reasonable amount I will start programming once again. :)
-John

item.title: Max Players? - John
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

I know man, i can take 15 players on 4Gb of Ram, how gay is that, all that ram for nothing =(.

[quote="[-J O H N-"]link=topic=224012.msg1933457#msg1933457 date=1197786993]
Errr i kinda need this topic to die now… Because I need help with something new if I dont find it. I need to figure out how to add Defense so it actually works. (More fun when pking with defense :))[/quote]

Bro damn just when i lost my CD, i had that, defense actually works on my server, if i ever find my CD, i’ll pm you html file.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @_J_O_H_N [-J O H N-]
item.description:
@_J_O_H_N wrote:

From the 2 others it seems I set a record

Thanks all this will help me alot. I’ll start hosting a server again soon. Im gunna stick to the server base I released awhile ago since it seems this pc will hold alot more. My other pc lagged and dced my internet at 30players (960MB one lol.) I hope this is better… Im gunna start working on my oldy server again,

Peace,
John

Ps. Hai Java!

item.title: Max Players? - John
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

[quote="[-J O H N-"]link=topic=224012.msg1933405#msg1933405 date=1197784969]

[quote author=[-J O H N-] link=topic=224012.msg1933381#msg1933381 date=1197783856]
I hate lagging. Every time I get nulled it last 4 mins till I go lagging. I don’t like Lagg, Lagg and i got in a fight so each time it comes back it has a knife and a rifle in its pocket… So i try to avoid lagg as much as i can… :o
[/quote]Then judging by that, I doubt your server will hold as much as I thought it would.

Anyways, why post a topic asking when you can use sL’s method of figuring it out, or just post it on status list and wait?

I’v never ran a server on this Computer, that was just a story about how I hate that dirty Lagg.

Also reason Im not hosting and putting on status yet is because its still in private beta. I’m not gunna host yet. Anyway yea Lagg on my other pc… it is crazy…[/quote]Then use another server and put it on the list. There’s lots you can choose from in the downloads section.

Read full topic
